data.title: Princess Maria Isabel de Orléans e Bragança, née Bavaria (1914-2011)
data.meta_description: Dona Maria Francisca Theresa Josepha Elizabeth (Isabel) of Wittelsbach and Croy-Solre de Orléans e Bragança passed away today,  13 may at 1: 40 PM (Brazilia...
data.text:
Dona Maria Francisca Theresa Josepha Elizabeth (Isabel) of Wittelsbach and Croy-Solre de Orléans e Bragança passed away today, 13 may at 1: 40 PM (Brazilia time)at her home residence in the neighborhood of Jardim Botânico, Rio de Janeiro, RJ. The wake will take place at the Igreja Matriz (Seed of the Parish) in the city of Vassouras from 10 a.m. to 12 a.m. on May 14 when and where a mass will be celebrated. Her body will be buried at the Imperial Family Tomb in the same city cemetery.

Dona Maria Isabel was born on September 9, 1914, in the castle of Nymphenburg, Munich, at the time capital of the Kingdom of Bavaria, then belonging to the German Empire. She was the second daughter of Franscico (1875-1957), Prince of Bavaria, son of Ludwig III of Bavaria, last Sovereign King of Bavaria and Elizabeth (1890-1982), Princess of Croy. Dona Maria Isabel married Prince Pedro Henrique of Orleans e Bragança on 19 August 1937. D. Pedro Henrique had been the head of the Imperial House of Brazil since 1921, when his grandmother Princess Isabel died. Dona Maria Isabel and Dom Pedro Henrique had 12 children:

01 - D. Luis Gastão de Orléans e Bragança (1938), current head of the Imperial House of Brazil;

02 - D. Eudes of Orléans e Bragança (1939);

03 - D. Bertrand de Orléans e Bragança (1941). tThe current Prince Imperial of Brazil, and second in line of succession

04 - Dona Isabel Maria of Orléans e Bragança (1944)

05 - D. Pedro de Alcântara Henrique de Orléans e Bragança (b. 1945);

06 - D. Fernando Diniz de Orléans e Bragança (b. 1948);

07 - D. Antônio João de Orléans e Bragança (1950); the third in line of succession.

08 - Dona Eleonora de Orléans e Bragança (1953);

09 - D. Francisco de Orléans e Bragança (1955);

10 - D. Alberto de Orléans e Bragança (1957);

11 – Dona Maria Teresa de Orléans e Bragança (1959);

12 – Dona Maria Gabriela of Orléans-Braganza (1959).

Dona Maria Isabel is also survived bu 29 granchildren and 9 great-grandchildren.

Rede Imperial

BLOG WILLIAM XAVIER

Blog da Hildegard Angel » Hoje, dia da Princesa Isabel, morre a princesa Dona Maria!

Rest in Peace.

Descendance so numerous as stars in the sky!

She and her husband were truly blessed
